alert.note: Alert for Finney; Kearny (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 06 at 7:25PM CDT by NWS Dodge City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Kearny and west central Finney Counties through 800 PM CDT... At 725 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm very near Lakin, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Deerfield around 745 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Garden City and Holcomb. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CDT for southwestern Kansas.
